short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy bird but the pipes sometimes move.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy bird but the pipes sometimes move. Although the difficulty curve is pretty flat, the game is still quite hard, so it is still great for competing against friends.
